thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Jean Gutmann
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Jean Gutmann

author: Jean Gutmann
title: Jean Gutmann
text:
GoWay Travel got us on the road and on the water to experience Patagonia in the best way (natural beauty, wilderness, and great accomodations for a location that is NOT easy to experience without hiking through it). We arranged day-tours, long-distance shuttles and TWO small-ship cruises which turned out to be outstanding experiences!
We were assisted by Michael, in Toronto, who always responded promptly, had in-depth knowledge of the Patagonia region, and was sensitive to our financial issues. GoWay has a long history in South America and it shows -- anyone can research hotels on their own these days, but GoWay provides you with the details and comparisons about transportation and activities that only comes from "being there". Expect your travel planner to have put feet-on-the-ground at your destination -- GoWay does that.
Would recommend GoWay to anyone planning a trip to S. America -- you can use them for the whole package or just have them recommend and book small pieces of your journey. Enjoy!
